dict.acceptation: 夜；晚上；（举行盛事的）夜晚；

sent.orig: Night-vision technology, including night vision and infra-red night vision in two ways.
sent.trans: 夜视技术包括微光夜视和红外夜视两方面。

sent.orig: Last night and the night Before I coughed all night.
sent.trans: 昨晚和前天晚上我整夜咳嗽。

sent.orig: Night-vision goggles, there are two, one is low-light night-vision goggles, one is infrared night-vision goggles.
sent.trans: 夜视镜有两种，一种是微光夜视镜，一种是红外夜视镜。

sent.orig: Infrared night-vision technology is divided into active and passive infrared night vision technology, infrared night-vision technology.
sent.trans: 红外夜视技术分为主动红外夜视技术和被动红外夜视技术。

sent.orig: Can you stay the night/stay over night (ie spend the night here)?
